casebody.data:
Peter Cyr v. Deborah Cyr (14473)

Peters, C. J., Callahan, Glass, Borden and Berdon, Js.

Argued June 5 decision released June 23, 1992 Joseph X. DuMond, Jr., assistant attorney general, with whom were Seymour Dunn, assistant attorney *556general, and, on the brief, Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, for the appellant (state). Louis Kiefer, for the appellee (plaintiff). Lucy Potter, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
